summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing the need to interview a proposed team before sending it to another individual named Tom. The email emphasizes the importance of confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing the need for a team interview.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

persons.name: Tom
persons.context: Tom is mentioned as the person to whom the proposed team will be sent, though no further details are provided.

connections.description: Epstein communicates with Staley regarding team interviews, indicating a working relationship.

keyFacts: The email emphasizes confidentiality and attorney-client privilege.
Epstein expresses the importance of interviewing a proposed team before sending it to Tom.
The email contains a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.
